item.title: Books in 2023
item.description: One of my biggest achievements of 2023 was developing the reading tempo I had back in college – it may seem trivial but it is a big deal for me. I started with a very humble goal of reading 10 books in 2023 and I was able to achieve it by November. Here’s the list of books I read . To achieve this goal I had to: Remove social media apps from my phone.
